title: New: ATLAS – Lullaby
content:
London trip hop duo ATLAS ooze sex from every pore, with new track Lullaby demonstrating this sublimely, as it’s intertwines intricately throughout it’s six and a half minutes.

The instrumental sections are kept to a bare minimum, with a wooden sounding percussion section leading the track before collapsing in on itself around the four minute mark, into a deliriously wonderful mesh of disjointed beats. As with her two debut tracks, Lullaby showcases ATLAS’s vocals to exalted effect, as she flirts between spoken word and silky smooth chorus parts; “Your time is nigh, soon you will find, Another heart to crucify”.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
